Text: Your uploads are always something to look forward to ... rarely seen material is always exciting to see .. A+ as usual!

Thanks for the comment pcvjs :) i was surprised not to find this promo on youtube, because most of the times it's posted there, though in a blocky flash video form, lol. i'll get a few more posted and seed for awhile before i play Black Ops again (love the zombie co-op + the C4 remote control car in multiplayer, best game ever made!)
